title: Strengthening Software Development Competencies: Simulation-Based Training and Learning Transfer Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply learned content to real work environments with over 80% accuracy after simulation training.
Learners collaborate with peers in social problem-solving simulations to develop action plans with 90% participation.
Learners scoring 75+ in formative assessments can explain the impact of simulation design elements (goal alignment, feedback systems, etc.) on learning transfer.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
